details.message:
`004.001.001 Active_Asset_Type`
- Test generates and configures an asset type, "TAT-2" with the following characteristics. 
- Belongs to asset group "TAG-2".
- Has a maintenance strategy "The Thunderbolt Strategy".
- Has 8 attributes of every datatype. (See `003.001.002`)
- Has asset condition standard of "LGTM".
- Belongs to failure group of "Utterly Catastrophic Failure".
- Has a failure type of "Spontaneous Combustion".
- Has a failure profile of "Whoops!".
details.name: 004.001.001 Active_Asset_Type
